markdownRemark.html:
Today I had the opportunity to speak with a class of 7th grade students about programming and a career in software engineering.

These students gave up their lunch period for the opportunity to learn.

Below are their unedited questions.

I found it astounding and heart-warming that such young individuals can ask such poignant and mature questions. It gives me great hope for the future.

  1. What program did you learn first?

frontmatter.title: What Seventh Graders Want to Know About Programming
